about.title: About SHIKI Photography
about.description: We are local photographers passionate about capturing the beauty of Hokkaido's four seasons. With deep knowledge of the best locations and perfect timing, we help you create unforgettable memories.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: SHIKI Photography was born from a deep love for Hokkaido's breathtaking natural beauty and the desire to share it with visitors from around the world. "Shiki" (四季) means "four seasons" in Japanese, representing our commitment to capturing the unique charm of each season in Hokkaido.
story.paragraph2: As local photographers, we have witnessed countless sunrises over the Tokachi Plains, explored hidden hot springs in the mountains, and experienced the magic of Hokkaido's powder snow. This intimate knowledge of our homeland allows us to guide you to the most stunning locations at the perfect moments.
story.paragraph3: Our mission is to create not just beautiful photographs, but lasting memories that tell the story of your time in Hokkaido. Whether you're celebrating a proposal, enjoying a family vacation, or preparing for your wedding, we're here to capture those precious moments with artistry and care.
